description: This Dart source file defines a utility class 'LocalSqliteTestUtils' for debugging purposes. It provides a static method to check if a SQLite database exists, and to list its tables and indexes. The class is intended for developers to inspect the database during development, not for production use.

classes.name: LocalSqliteTestUtils
classes.description: A utility class that provides a method to inspect the contents of a local SQLite database, including its tables and indexes.

methods.name: inspectDb
methods.description: A static asynchronous method that constructs the database path, opens the database, retrieves its tables and indexes, and returns a summary map containing the database path, list of table names, and list of index details.
